p: Additionally, P4 was found to contain compounds, which can be obtained from Amyris balsamifera oil (valerianol, elemol and eudesmol isomers), but in far smaller quantities than in the pure oil. Although this oil, according to the description, was supposed to come from the Santalum album, α- and β-santalol were not detected in its composition. This suggests that P4 is a synthetic composition imitating sandalwood fragrance, not “natural essential oil 100%” from the sandalwood tree.
